sqlMap.select: SELECT SUBSTR(sys_connect_by_path(A.itemID, '.'), 2) AS TREE, A.ITEMID, A.ITEMPID, A.LVL, A.NAME, A.ENAME, A.USEFLAG, A.PRICE, A.BASICCOND, A.BASICUNIT, A.BASICCNT, A.CALCBASE, A.ADDPRICE, A.ETC, A.REGID, A.REGDATE, A.MODIFYID, A.MODIFYDATE, A.OLDYN, A.ORDERBY, A.OLDID, B.TESTCOND FROM TCE_ITEM A, ( WITH TESTCOND AS ( SELECT ITEMID, A.TEMPERCOND || B.CODENAME || '/' || TIMECOND || C.CODENAME || '/' || ETC || D.CODENAME TESTCOND FROM tne_condition a, tct_code_detail b, tct_code_detail c, tct_code_detail d WHERE a.TEMPUNIT = b.codeid (+) AND a.TIMECONDUNIT = c.codeid (+) AND a.ETCUNIT = d.codeid (+) ) SELECT itemid, replace(wm_concat(TESTCOND), ',', ', ') AS TESTCOND FROM TESTCOND GROUP BY itemid ) B WHERE A.ITEMID = B.ITEMID (+) AND A.OLDYN = 'N' START WITH (A.ITEMPID = 0) CONNECT BY PRIOR A.ITEMID = A.ITEMPID ORDER SIBLINGS BY ORDERBY

WITH item AS ( SELECT rownum, substr(sys_connect_by_path(replace(name, '_', ''), '_'), 2) treeItemName, SUBSTR(sys_connect_by_path(itemID, '.'), 2) TREE, ITEMID, ITEMPID, LVL, NAME, ENAME, USEFLAG, PRICE, BASICCOND, BASICUNIT, BASICCNT, CALCBASE, ADDPRICE, ETC, REGID, REGDATE, MODIFYID, MODIFYDATE, OLDYN, ORDERBY, OLDID FROM ( SELECT i.ITEMID, i.ITEMPID, i.LVL, i.NAME, i.ENAME, i.USEFLAG, i.PRICE, i.BASICCOND, i.BASICUNIT, i.BASICCNT, i.CALCBASE, i.ADDPRICE, i.ETC, i.REGID, i.REGDATE, i.MODIFYID, i.MODIFYDATE, i.OLDYN, i.ORDERBY, i.OLDID FROM tce_item i, (SELECT itemid, itempid, d.methodid, unitid, etc, m.name FROM tne_item_detail d, tce_method M WHERE D.methodid = m.methodid ) D WHERE i.oldyn != 'Y' AND i.useflag = 'Y' AND i.itemid = d.itemid (+) AND i.itempid = d.itempid (+) ) START WITH (itempid = 0) CONNECT BY PRIOR itemid = itempid ORDER SIBLINGS BY to_number(orderby), itemid ) SELECT * FROM ( item ) WHERE itemid IN ( SELECT itemid FROM item WHERE treeitemname LIKE '%' || #name# || '%' UNION SELECT itempid FROM item WHERE treeItemname LIKE '%' || #name# || '%' UNION (select itempid from item where ITEMID in ( SELECT itempid FROM item WHERE treeItemname LIKE '%' || #name# || '%') ) )

SELECT RESULTID, REQID, SMPID, ITEMID, ITEMPID, METHODID, UNITID, DISPLAYUNIT, EQUIPID, LVL, ITEMREGID, REPORTUNIT, TEMPERCOND, TIMECOND, SMPAMOUNT, ITEMTERM, RESULTTYPE, ITEMVALUE, RESULTVALUE, RESULTCONTENTS, ANNOTATION, REMARK, ITEMPRICE, ITEMSTATE, ORDERBY, ADDPRICE, ADDPRICECOND, FIXCNT, RESULTSTATE, COOPERYN, REGID, REGDATE, MODIFYID, MODIFYDATE, METHODNM, ITEMENAME, OFFICEID, ITEMNAME, SCSEQN FROM TNE_RESULT WHERE ITEMID = #itemID#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TCE_ITEM A SET ITEMID = #itemID#, ITEMPID = #itemPID#, LVL = #lvl#, NAME = #name#, ENAME = #eName#, USEFLAG = #useFlag#, PRICE = #price#, BASICCOND = #basicCond#, BASICUNIT = #basicUnit#, BASICCNT = #basicCnt#, ADDPRICE = #addPrice#, CALCBASE = #calcBase#, ETC = #etc#, REGID = #regID#, MODIFYID = #modifyID#, MODIFYDATE = sysdate, OLDYN = 'N', ORDERBY = #orderBy#, OLDID = #oldID# WHERE A.ITEMID = #itemID#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TCE_ITEM (ITEMID, ITEMPID, LVL, NAME, ENAME, USEFLAG, PRICE, BASICCOND, BASICUNIT, BASICCNT, CALCBASE, ADDPRICE, ETC, REGID, REGDATE, MODIFYID, MODIFYDATE, OLDYN, ORDERBY) VALUES (SEQ_TCE_ITEM.nextval, #itemPID#, #lvl#, #name#, #eName#, #useFlag#, #price#, #basicCond#, #basicUnit#, #basicCnt#, #calcBase#, #addPrice#, #etc#, #regID#, sysdate, #modifyID#, #modifyDate#, 'N', #orderBy# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT CONDID, ITEMID, ITEMPID, TEMPERCOND, TEMPUNIT, TIMECOND, TIMECONDUNIT, ETC, REGID, REGDATE, MODIFYID, MODIFYDATE, ETCUNIT FROM TNE_CONDITION WHERE ITEMID = #itemID#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TNE_CONDITION ( CONDID, ITEMID, ITEMPID, TEMPERCOND, TEMPUNIT, TIMECOND, TIMECONDUNIT, ETC, REGID, REGDATE, MODIFYID, MODIFYDATE, ETCUNIT ) VALUES (SEQ_TNE_CONDITION.nextval, #itemID#, #itemPID#, #temperCond#, #tempUnit#, #timeCond#, #timeCondUnit#, #etc#, #regID#, sysdate, #modifyID#, #modifyDate#, #etcUnit#
)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TNE_CONDITION A SET ITEMID = #itemID#, ITEMPID = #itemPID#, TEMPERCOND = #temperCond#, TEMPUNIT = #tempUnit#, TIMECOND = #timeCond#, TIMECONDUNIT = #timeCondUnit#, ETC = #etc#, MODIFYID = #modifyID#, MODIFYDATE = sysdate, ETCUNIT = #etcUnit# WHERE A.condID = #condID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.CODEGROUPID, A.CODEID, A.CODENAME, A.USEFLAG, A.REGID, A.REGDATE, A.MODIFYID, A.MODIFYDATE, B.CODEGROUPNAME FROM TCT_CODE_DETAIL A LEFT JOIN TCT_CODE_GROUP B ON A.CODEGROUPID = B.CODEGROUPID WHERE A.USEFLAG = 'Y'
SELECT count(ITEMID) FROM ( SELECT ITEMID FROM TCE_ITEM START WITH ITEMID = (SELECT ITEMID FROM TCE_ITEM WHERE ITEMID = #itemID#) CONNECT BY PRIOR ITEMID = ITEMPID)
